title: What does the Google antitrust ruling mean for the future of AI?
description: A federal judge's mild ruling in the Justice Department's suit over Google's search engine monopoly has critics worried that the tech giant can now monopolize artificial intelligence.

title: 'There's no shoving that genie back in the bottle': Readers believe it's too late to stop the progression of AI
description: Over 1,700 readers responded to a Live Science poll, and 30% of them believe it is too late to halt the development of artificial intelligence (AI).

title: Govt to establish AI R&D hubs across key sectors: Sitharaman
description: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Thursday said the government has identified several Institutes of Excellence to host artificial intelligence (AI)-focused research and development (R&D) and training programmes, targeting four priority sectors—agriculture, education, health, and urban living.

title: Medicare prior authorization pilot program coming to Ohio
description: Artificial intelligence will soon play a role in whether Medicare will pay for Ohioans' pain relief therapy and skin substitute bandages.
content:
The program, called WISeR, aims to reduce wasteful spending and fraud in the Medicare system.
Doctors and Democrats have raised concerns that the pre-approval process could delay or deny necessary patient care.

title: IBM and BharatGen join hands to advance AI adoption in India with Indic Language Models
